Class AbstractFileSystemScanJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.scheduler.api.job.AbstractCXJob
      • de.ityx.scheduler.jobs.base.AbstractFileSystemScanJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.quartz.Job
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractVFSAuthJob, AbstractVFSJob

    @PersistJobDataAfterExecution
public abstract class AbstractFileSystemScanJob
extends de.ityx.scheduler.api.job.AbstractCXJob

      • getUniqueResourceIdentifier

        protected String getUniqueResourceIdentifier(org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject o)
        Returns a unique identifier for the given FileObject, per default this is simply the URI.
        Parameters:
        the - FileObject
        Returns:
        a unique identifier for given FileObject

      • resourceProcessed

        protected void resourceProcessed(org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject fileObject,
                     de.ityx.scheduler.api.job.resource.InputResource resource,
                     Set<String> blacklist)
                          throws de.ityx.scheduler.api.job.exception.ResourceCommitException
        Called from execute()-method after the given FileObject/InputResource has been processed successfully. This method is mainly used to mark a FileObject as 'processed' to ensure that the corresponding file is not imported multiple times.
        The given blacklist should not be used for marking files as 'processed' as the blacklist may grow and it is stored in persistent execution context.

        The default implementation simply deletes the given FileObject.
        Parameters:
        fileObject - the successfully imported FileObject
        resource - the correspond InputResource
        blacklist - a 'blacklist' that contains URI's of FileObjects that should be ignored by import.
        Throws:
        de.ityx.scheduler.api.job.exception.ResourceCommitException

      • createInputResource

        protected de.ityx.scheduler.api.job.resource.InputResource createInputResource(org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject fileObject)

      • findResources

        protected org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject[] findResources(org.quartz.JobExecutionContext schedulerContext,
                                                 org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject base,
                                                 Map<String,Object> configMap,
                                                 Set<String> blacklist)
                                                      throws org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException
        Returns children of given Base-FileObject depending on the given configMap.
        Implementations have to check if a FileObject is contained in blacklist.
        Parameters:
        schedulerContext -
        base - the base FileObject
        configMap - map with configuration like filename pattern etc.
        blacklist - contains unique identifier ( getUniqueIdentifier() ) that have to be ignored
        Returns:
        array of FileObject that should be imported
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException

      • getBase

        protected abstract org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject getBase(String baseName,
                                         Map<String,Object> configMap)
                                                       throws org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException
        Opens the configured base directory, including authentication if necessary, and returns a FileObject pointing to it.
        Depending on the implementation the returned FileObject can be a LocalFile, HttpFile etc.
        Parameters:
        baseName - the base directory
        configMap - Map with additional configuration like username, password etc.
        Returns:
        an opened FileObject pointing to given base directory
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException

      • createUri

        protected abstract String createUri(String baseName,
               Map<String,Object> configMap)
        Builds depending on the implementation and configuration the URI pointing to the given base directory.
        Parameters:
        baseName - the base directory
        configMap - Map with additional configuration like host, port etc.
        Returns:

      • getProtocol

        protected abstract String getProtocol()
        Returns the protocol used by this implementation (i.e. 'http' or 'ftp') which is used to open the base directory within the getBase()-method.
        Returns:
        the protocol used by this implementation
